column4: well, i just discovered, that some ati cards. Mine is a x700 wont boot properly into the ubuntu desktop installer. A quick and easy fix, is altering the xorg.conf to use 'vesa' and sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart
Then again that makes you use the vesa drivers. :)
harriv: A) Yes, and B) Why would you want it?
it lets you access the installer. once installed just download a new/working driver ;)
